lines.text: I have nothing against men. I think every woman should own one.
You don't wanna spend the rest of your life with Delia Westwood - she smells like a horse.
As much as I'd like to live out this beer commercial, I've got responsibilities.
You're treating him like a side of potatoes!
...I'm handcuffed, I'm in jail, and my butt hurts. This is not good!
